name: Scrap Up
description:
Scrap Up is a 2 player round based multiplayer game in which you are fighting against each other. You can choose from 1 to 9 rounds. In each round you can collect scrap points, that you can use to buy upgrades and weapons.

please consider that the game is still in development.

At the moment you can play the game with the keyboard or with an Nintendo controler.

PS4 and X-Box controler support is in development.
